description:
- Can we end this game, already? -
The twins Metatron and Sandalphon have absolute faith in one another, so they deduce that Keter must be inside either Michael or Gabriel.
Showing no mercy, they attack!
All the while, Lucifer is still unable to overcome the challenges of her training.
Will the Heavens be left to the mercy of Keter...?!
Source: YouTube
